Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
By using Philio home sensing you can control the dimmer value or turn on(off) the switch.

To control the Philio Home Sensing with Alexa you need:
•  Get a Philio home gateway hardware and controllable device (switch or dimmer)
•  Download the Philio Home mate 2 App
•  Login the Home Gateway using Home mate 2
•  Go go Setting / Other Setting / Voice Control
•  Sign-in with your Gmail Account && enable Alexa Service
•  Download Amazon Alexa app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app
•  Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Home Sensing"
•  Click Enable skill of "Home Sensing", then login your Gmail Account
•  Discover devices in Alexa app
•  Say:
 "Alexa, turn on switch"
 "Alexa, turn on the dimmer"
 "Alexa, dim the lights"

For more Philio device information: https://www.zwavetaiwan.com.tw/products
